channel.title: MMINDI Old Town Alexandria, VA/Washington DC Reunion/Birthday Weekend (July 13-17, 2017)
channel.description: MMINDI Old Town Alexandria, VA/Washington DC 2017 Reunion/Birthday Weekend, July 13-17 site information, etc.

item.title: Draft Agenda
item.description:
*subject to change - 2017.03.22

Tentative Schedule – Additional Details and Costs to be added as they become available.

  • As the planning of this event is in progress we’d like to ask for a $50 deposit to indicate that you plan to attend. The $50 will be deducted from your total registration. Payment can be made through PalPay to mmindi2015@gmail.com or sending a check to Lisa Thackston, 38 Forest Drive, Palmyra, Virginia 22963. This will be a family friendly event – with each event include kids if you’d like (and as you indicate they are attending). Saturday evening there will be babysitting offered during the dinner party. Please let us know if you plan to bring your family. There will be reduced costs for kids attending. Associated costs (for your planning) would/could include: travel, hotel (or house), registration fee, Friday night reception, Saturday dinner party/cash bar, Sunday BBQ, and Monday morning farewell bagels/coffee… Plus, additional things you/your family might like to do while in the area. Anyone interested in helping with the planning, organizing, set-up, etc. please contact Lisa Thackston at lisathackston@mmindiconnect.com.


Thursday, July 13th
  • Check-in to a house in Old Town Alexandria – this house becomes our “hub” for the weekend. There will be a couple organized events at this location; however, it will be available to hang out/meet up, etc. throughout the weekend. It is within walking distance to the metro (to go into DC), as well as lots of shopping, food, entertainment, etc.
    The “hub” house has availability for some overnight guests. We will have a block of rooms booked at a nearby hotel. Hotel: this will be block as soon as the location of the house is determine/reserved – the plan is for it to be within walking distance of the “hub” house.
Friday, July 14th, 6:00pm -- 10:00pm
  • 6:00pm -- 10:00pm Meet & Greet Reception at the “hub” house - heavy appetizers/beer/wine/soda
    We can plan some specific local activities during the morning/day if folks would like – or they can do things on their own.
Saturday, July 15th, 6:00pm
  • Dinner at a local Italian Restaurant - babysitting would be offered at the “hub” house
    We can plan some specific local activities during the morning/day if folks would like – or they can do things on their own.
Sunday, July 16th
  • Afternoon BBQ – at the “hub” house
Monday, July 17th
  • Fairly early morning coffee/bagels at the “hub” house
Things to do:

  • METRO Information: (a great way to get around the DC area!) https://www.wmata.com/

  • Old Town Alexandria Links:
    -- Visit Alexandria
    -- Old Town Alexandria
    -- Essentials
    -- Waterfront Activities

  • Washington, DC Links:
    -- Washington.org
    -- USNews Washington DC Travel Guide
    -- Smithsonian Museums
    -- Washington.org National Mall



* Registration is forthcoming, there will be a Registration fee.

item.title: Need Deposits
item.description:
• Hub House Rental

To make this HAPPEN we need DEPOSITS NOW!

  • Go here!:

  • Information: This is a house rental in Old Town Alexandria – this house becomes our “hub” for the weekend. There will be a couple organized events at this location; however, it will be available to hang out/meet up, etc. throughout the weekend. It is within walking distance to the metro (to go into DC), as well as lots of shopping, food, entertainment, etc.

We have, on first come, first served basis with direct contact with Lisa Thackston at lisathackston@mmindiconnect.com who is managing these:

  • There are 3 Queen Bedrooms, an attic media room with a futon (double/queen) and then a pullout sofa in the Living Room.
    • Prices as follows:
      $120/night for the Queen Bedrooms
      $100/night for the Attic Media Room
      $75/night for the sofa bed in the Living Room

item.title: Announcement MMINDI VA-DC 2017 Reunion/Birthday Event
item.description:
To be held in Old Town Alexandria, VA/Washington DC, on July 13-17...

Hello Fellow MMI & NDI Classmates (of all years!),

Earlier this year we asked if you were interested in a 2017 Reunion/Birthday Bash (for many turning 50!) – we got a great response of interest. We asked where, when, and a couple other planning questions. We ran with the feedback we got –and then – Nothing.

So, flying with some feedback we did get - we found a Victorian Mansion to possibly host the reunion in; however, we had to let it go without enough commitment (clock was ticking on that reservation).

So we've settled on trying for a smaller 'hub' house that a few folks can stay in and the rest of us at some nearby hotel(s) that we're working on block reservations on.

To make this happen we need your donations while we secure the house and we get the rest of the details ironed out (VERY SOON - already IN PROGRESS!)

See our links for Tentative Schedule with Friday Meet & Greet, Saturday Dinner Plans, Sunday BBQ, and last Monday morning hangout! Plenty of things and places to go while we catchup and visit!
